features: SKINCARE FOR EVERY ST{AGE} Clean skin is one of your best defenses against the appearance of aging. This gel-to-foam cleanser gently cleanses and removes impurities without stripping skin of hydration.

RESULTS ARE IN! AFTER JUST 1 USE* 100% confirmed skin felt clean without residue, 97% agreed impurities were gently removed, 88% noticed skin felt refreshed, 78% noticed skin felt hydrated after rinsing. *Proven results in an independent consumer study on 36 women ages 30-60 yrs old.
LIGHTWEIGHT HYDRATORS This gentle foaming cleanser is formulated with plant-based surfactants for a rich lather, while phytonutrients, flower oils and vanilla help hydrate and nourish the skin.
FREE OF HARSH CHEMICALS formulated without parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, silicones or sulfates.
100% VEGAN AND CRUELTY-FREE safe for the planet, animals, and you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is such a a wonderful cleanser
reviews.reviewText: It's beyond my favorite cleanser that I have used on my face, it's like having a facial massage because it feels so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My first use of this product and it burned my skin. I’ve used 4 different Pacifica cleansers over the last few years with no issues, so this was surprising as I love the brand. The smell is nice but overpowering. I won’t be using it again and do not recommend. My skin still stings.
